title: Denmark Joins Austria in Easing Virus Curbs...

content:
(Bloomberg) -- Denmark joined Austria in announcing a gradual relaxation of measures imposed to slow the novel coronavirus, as attention in Europe began to turn to exit strategies once the worst of the pandemic passes.
